arcade.env.comp

Class RemodelComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.env.comp.RemodelComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class RemodelComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
    Implementation of Component for remodeling edges.

    This component can only be used with GraphSites. The radius and wall thickness of edges are remodeled as a function of shear stress (SCALE_SHEAR), circumferential stress (SCALE_CIRCUM), flow rate (SCALE_FLOW), and metabolic demand (SCALE_META). The scaling based on shear (tau) and circumferential (sigma) stress mainly affect radius mid and area mass, respectively, but can also affect the other term (SCALE_SIGMA and SCALE_TAU). Edges that are below a minimum wall thickness or radius are removed from the graph. All hemodynamic properties are recalculated at the end of the step.

    Since:
    2.3
    Version:
    2.3.9
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemodelComponent

        public RemodelComponent(MiniBox component)
        Creates a Component object for remodeling.

        Specifications include:

        • SCALE_SHEAR = scaling of shear stress
        • SCALE_CIRCUM = scaling of circumferential stress
        • SCALE_FLOWRATE = scaling of flow rate
        • SCALE_META = scaling of metabolic demand
        • SCALE_TAU = scaling of shear stress contribution to area mass
        • SCALE_SIGMA = scaling of circumferential stress contribution of radius mid
        Parameters:
        component - the parsed component attributes
